articles.description: Cases, hospitalizations and deaths remain far below last winter’s peak, but the director urged people to get fully vaccinated.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization recently repeated its recommendation that even vaccinated people should continue to wear masks, in part because of the global spread of Delta.

articles.title: 95% of COVID patients hospitalized in Orange County are unvaccinated, OC health officials say - KABC-TV
articles.description: Orange County health officials say more than 95% of those currently hospitalized for the virus in the county are unvaccinated.

articles.title: Washington’s fentanyl crisis deepens as overdose deaths continue to rise - MyNorthwest.com
articles.description: Washington continues to grapple with a troubling increase in fentanyl-related overdose deaths, according to recent data from the state Department of Health.
